channel.title: Fishing sharks
channel.description: Well when I get 76 fishing (I got 13 :P but my cooking was 20 and I got it up to 60 in two days) I'm going to start fishing sharks for a little $ what I want to no is to use a barbed tail harpoon or a regular? And an estimate of how long you have to wait for a load (I will be using the fishing guild) I also will be using 1 or 2 fishing pots a trip. Also if it's still a good way of making money (I'm not going to be cooking them as I will be cba to get 20+ levels in cooking) Thanks

item.title: Fishing sharks
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

No exe… no…

Sharks are easier to get the requirments…

But Monks make more money…

But my method, makes more money then both.

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing sharks
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

exe626:

I agree with Taharok. People don’t talk about sharks in BH anymore, they all use monks. They sell for pretty much the same price, Swan Song is easy, and if you think fishing sharks is easier, you can gtfo.

Idk…I’m cba to get 100qp and all those req [15qp]

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing sharks
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

It is your choice. You could probably make over twice as much money doing monkfish than sharks.

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing sharks
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:20, topic:193561”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=257691.msg2144557#msg2144557 date=1206822499]

Why fucking fish Sharks, you can fish about 2-3 invents of Monks in the time it takes you to fish Sharks at the minimum level, and pictorious fishing colony is hardly full, so you’re often alone with more spots to yourself.

Because it would take me forever to do swan song
[/quote]

No excuses mister.[/quote]
Yes thats a good excuse because It would be easier for me to get to 76 fishing then get all the requirments for swan song and I’m all ready 41fishing (was 10yesterday)

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing sharks
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:16, topic:193561”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=257691.msg2143501#msg2143501 date=1206779284]

There are faster alternatives to making money, but fishing is an easy way. As you can just click the spot and do something while you wait for you to get full of fish/the fishing spot moves.

This is why I want to fish around 10k raw sharks and sell for around 10mil

Good luck sitting there for 120 hours. And, because you play runescape for around 2 hours a day, it should only take you two months to get 10k sharks. No big deal, eh?
[/quote]
Or I could just fish 1k a day[/quote]

You’re going to play runescape 12 hours a day?

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing sharks
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:10, topic:193561”][quote author=Carson link=topic=257691.msg2142657#msg2142657 date=1206761015]
No point in fishing potions…

I’m 78 fishing currently, and i’ve been fishing sharks lately… I’ll tell you my information.

I get about a full load of sharks in about 20 mins, while i’m multitasking, youtube… myspace… mitb… ect…

I usally get logged out while i’m multi-tasking, so i’d say i could get a full load in around 15 if i paid attention.
[/quote]
Wow…so how long does 1k usually take you?[/quote]

well say that is 28 sharks a load taking 20 minutes so you need 1000 sharks 1000/28 = 36 x 20 = 714/60 = 12

so about 12 hours.

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing sharks
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

exe626:

Just use a barbed-tail harpoon. The idea of using a fishing potion per load is… pointless? Waste of money tbh.

Well I can make them or just buy them there not that much and the point is to get my fishing level 80+ so I can get 1 load over with as fast as I can?

Read full topic

item.title: Fishing sharks
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks
item.description:
@Baros_Rocks wrote:

Taharok:

Actually, you can do the barbarian training mini-quest and catch sharks without any harpoons at all (but you will need to have a few other levels too, like strength).

If i can remember correctly you’ll need 96 fishing. To fish without a harpoon you need to be 20 levels higher then what is required to catch them with a harpoon.

Read full topic
